name: mud golem
description: It is a faithful servant who moves with the power of magic. It is usually miniaturized and can be moved by blowing in magic.

use_action.friendly_msg: When you put magic into the core of the mud golem placed at your feet, it slowly sounded and became animate.
use_action.hostile_msg: Mud Golem became an enemy because control of the magic did not go well!

name: wood golem
description: It is a faithful servant who moves with the power of magic. It is usually miniaturized and can be moved by blowing in magic.

use_action.friendly_msg: When you put magic into the core of the wood golem placed at your feet, it slowly sounded and became animate.
use_action.hostile_msg: Without good control of the magical power, the wood golem became an enemy!
